item.title: Tofu Stir-Fry
item.description: Experience the vibrant flavors of this Tofu Stir-Fry, packed with crunchy vegetables and a sweet and tangy sauce. It's a quick and healthy meal that brings excitement to your dinner table!
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
⏱️ Prep Time: 15 minutes

🍳 Cook Time: 30 minutes

⏰ Total Time: 45 minutes

🍽️ Servings: 4

📊 Difficulty: Easy

🥘 Ingredients

  • 1 block firm tofu, pressed and cubed
  • 2 tablespoons vegetable oil
  • 2 cups mixed vegetables (bell peppers, broccoli, carrots)
  • 3 tablespoons soy sauce
  • 1 tablespoon sweet chili sauce
  • 1 teaspoon garlic, minced
  • 1 teaspoon ginger, minced

👩‍🍳 Instructions

  1. Heat vegetable oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
  2. Add cubed tofu and cook until golden brown, about 5-7 minutes.
  3. Stir in mixed vegetables and cook for another 5 minutes until tender-crisp.
  4. Add garlic and ginger, sauté for 1 minute until fragrant.
  5. Pour in soy sauce and sweet chili sauce, stir well to combine and heat through.

📌 Save this recipe to Pinterest!

item.title: Red Lentil Bread Rolls
item.description: These Red Lentil Bread Rolls are a delightful twist on traditional bread. Soft, fluffy, and packed with protein, they make a perfect addition to any meal or a tasty snack on their own.
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
⏱️ Prep Time: 15 minutes

🍳 Cook Time: 30 minutes

⏰ Total Time: 45 minutes

🍽️ Servings: 4

📊 Difficulty: Easy

🥘 Ingredients

  • 1 cup red lentils, rinsed and drained
  • 2 cups water
  • 1 teaspoon salt
  • 1 teaspoon garlic powder
  • 1 teaspoon onion powder
  • 1/2 teaspoon black pepper
  • 1 teaspoon baking powder

👩‍🍳 Instructions

  1. In a pot, combine red lentils and water. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer until lentils are soft, about 15 minutes.
  2. Drain excess water and mash lentils until smooth.
  3. Add salt, garlic powder, onion powder, black pepper, and baking powder to the mashed lentils. Mix until well combined.
  4. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C) and line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
  5. Scoop tablespoon-sized portions of the mixture onto the prepared baking sheet, shaping them into rolls.
  6. Bake for 15-20 minutes, or until the rolls are firm and slightly golden on the outside.

item.title: Cinnamon-Sugar Air Fryer Banana Chips
item.description: Sweet, crispy, and guilt-free, these cinnamon-sugar air fryer banana chips are the perfect healthy snack that will satisfy your cravings without the guilt. Enjoy the delightful crunch and warm spices in every bite!
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
⏱️ Prep Time: 15 minutes

🍳 Cook Time: 25 minutes

⏰ Total Time: 40 minutes

🍽️ Servings: 4

📊 Difficulty: Easy

🥘 Ingredients

  • 4 ripe bananas
  • 2 tablespoons cinnamon
  • 1 tablespoon sugar
  • 1 tablespoon olive oil

👩‍🍳 Instructions

  1. Preheat the air fryer to 350°F (175°C).
  2. Slice the bananas thinly and toss them in a bowl with olive oil, cinnamon, and sugar.
  3. Arrange the banana slices in a single layer in the air fryer basket.
  4. Air fry for 15-20 minutes, shaking the basket halfway through, until crispy.

item.title: Grilled Vegetable Quinoa Salad
item.description: This Grilled Vegetable Quinoa Salad is a vibrant and nutritious dish that combines the earthy flavors of grilled vegetables with the nutty taste of quinoa. Perfect for a light lunch or as a side dish, it's both satisfying and refreshing.
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
⏱️ Prep Time: 15 minutes

🍳 Cook Time: 20 minutes

⏰ Total Time: 35 minutes

🍽️ Servings: 4

📊 Difficulty: Easy

🥘 Ingredients

  • 200g quinoa
  • 1 zucchini, diced
  • 1 bell pepper, diced
  • 1 eggplant, diced
  • 100g chickpeas, cooked
  • Juice of 1 lemon
  • 2 tablespoons olive oil
  • Fresh mint leaves, chopped

👩‍🍳 Instructions

  1. Cook the quinoa according to package instructions until fluffy.
  2. Grill the diced zucchini, bell pepper, and eggplant until tender and slightly charred.
  3. In a large bowl, combine the cooked quinoa, grilled vegetables, and chickpeas.
  4. Drizzle with lemon juice and olive oil, then toss gently to combine.
  5. Garnish with fresh mint before serving.
